item.description:
I guess we'll stick to my house again this time: the Idle Dog, 15 Glendale Street, Maynard, MA 01754. 978-973-7855. Deb Muise. 1pm till whenever.

The discussion to join the Dachshund/Small Dog meeting didn't result in a definitive resolution, so maybe we'll talk about it again. The theme of this one is "we survived the 2007 holiday season." Survival tips will be shared. There are expenses for goodies (dog & human) and for the $20/month membership fee. Contributions welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll make a sign for the front of the house. Check my website for directions: www.theidledog.com
item.why: The food can be great, The company is also friendly, and the dogs are wicked cute.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs January Meetup
